page.title: 09CLUBS
page.content: Within Garstang a great number of activities can be pursued at a great number of clubs.Here is a summary of some of the most important: SOCCER:This seems to be the most popular pastime with many local adult and junior soccer clubs to join. TENNIS:The tennis club was formed in 1980,this consists of a changing hut and 2 floodlight tennis courts. CANOEING:Canoeing enthusiasts are well catered for with the existence of the Garstang Canoe Club. CRICKET:The game of cricket first began in 1780(approx)Garstang now has a club of it's own using recreation land next to the river Wyre. DARTS:This is an ever increasing sport and is played in many of the local inns and hostelries. New clubs may well be introduced with the opening of the Sports Centre.
